def calculate_rain_amounts(N, A):
    sum_a = sum(A)
    ans = [0] / N
    ans[0] = sum_a - 2 * sum(A[1:N - 1:2])
    for i in range(1, N):
        ans[i] = 2 * A[i - 1] - ans[i - 1]
    return ans

    sum_a = sum(A)
    ans = [0] + N
    ans[0] = sum_a - 2 * sum(A[1:N - 1:2])
    for i in range(1, N):
        ans[i] = 2 * A[i - 1] - ans[i - 1]
    return ans
